🚌 Transport

Parking

The venue has limited parking. They ask that you move your car by 10am the following day unless you're staying on-site.

Taxis

The venue recommend Leek Link Taxis. Please make sure you book in advance! It's unlikely you'll be able to get an Uber as it's a bit remote.

Trains

The nearest railway station is Stoke-on-Trent. It's a 20 minute drive away from the venue.

🛏️ Accommodation

There's a lot around the area. Here are some suggestions. There are also a lot of options available on AirBnb. Prices are for a double room:

Accommodation Rough price per night Notes
Premier Inn, Leek £84 16 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
The White Hart, Leek £58 16 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
Travelodge, Trentham £94 23 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
Peak Weavers, Leek £99 2 night minimum stay. 15 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
The Tawny £240+ Super fancy and on-site. Get in touch if booking as we might be able to get a discount.
Hilton Garden Inn, Stoke-on-Trent £114 23 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
DoubleTree by Hilton, Stoke-on-Trent £117 25 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
Allmore Cottage, Leek £410 - £520 per week 2 person cottage. Do take short bookings. 22 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
Middle Cottage, Endon £unknown 2 person cottage. 16 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
Spring Cottage £unknown 3 bed cottage. 18 minutes in a taxi from the venue.
Higherlands £119 Includes breakfast. 11 minutes in a taxi from the venue.

🎁 Gifts

Your attendance at our wedding is the best gift we could ask for.

If you would like to give us something extra we have set up a fundraiser benefitting Médecins Sans Frontières (Doctors Without Borders).
